profile:
CB & Sons Construction Ltd is a fully insured full-service elite renovation company servicing the Fraser Valley with an outstanding reputation for quality, integrity and customer service. 
We work collaboratively with clients to bring their vision to reality. Careful and detailed planning allows us to be sure that projects are completed on-time, on-budget and hassle-free. 
We provide personalized and customized service to meet your design and renovation needs for any indoor space including kitchen, bathroom, bedroom or otherwise. 

Contact us for our free, detailed estimate and consultation.
https://cbsonsltd.com
Cell 604 897-5925
Email chadblack@Shaw.ca
